verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] imposing steep tariffs on steel and aluminum from three of America 's biggest trading partners — Canada , Mexico and the European Union , a senior administration official confirmed to CNN on Thursday .

[ARG0: President Trump] is [V: imposing] [ARG1: steep tariffs on steel and aluminum from three of America 's biggest trading partners — Canada , Mexico and the European Union] , a senior administration official confirmed to CNN on Thursday .

President Trump is imposing steep tariffs on steel and aluminum from three of America 's biggest trading partners — Canada , Mexico and the European Union , [ARG0: a senior administration official] [V: confirmed] [ARG2: to CNN] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] .
